list.title: SidechatAPIClient
list.description: Create a new instance of the API client

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#checkEmailVerification
list.description: Check is the user's email is verified.

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#createComment
list.description: Creates a comment on a post

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#createPost
list.description: Creates a new post in the specified group

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#defaultHeaders
list.description: Default headers for every API request

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#deletePostOrComment
list.description: Deletes a post or comment that the user created

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getAssetLibrary
list.description: Retrieves the entire accessible asset library. Be warned that as of the time of this documentation, it's a 1.5MB JSON download and this request is very expensive.

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getAvailableGroups
list.description: Gets groups to be displayed on the "Explore Groups" page

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getCurrentUser
list.description: Gets the current authenticated user and a list of the groups of which they are members.

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getGroupMetadata
list.description: Gets the metadata of a group from its ID

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getGroupPosts
list.description: Fetches posts from the specified category in a group

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getPostComments
list.description: Get all the commments on a post

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getUpdates
list.description: Get updated status for user and group

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#getUserAndGroup
list.description: Get updated status for user and group

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#loginViaSMS
list.description: Initiate the login process with a phone number. Should be followed up with verifySMSCode().

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#registerEmail
list.description: Initiate the email setup process. Should be followed up with checkEmailVerification().

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#setAge
list.description: Set the user's age. If this function succeeds, the user will be authenticated for future requests.

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#setDeviceID
list.description: Set the device ID of the current user

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#setToken
list.description: Manually set the currently signed in user's token. Generally try to avoid this and instead either pass a token to the constructor or login automatically through the auth functions

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#setVote
list.description: Upvote or downvote, or unvote a post

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#userToken
list.description: User bearer token

list.title: SidechatAPIClient#verifySMSCode
list.description: Verify the code sent via SMS with loginViaSMS(). If this function succeeds, the user will be authenticated for future requests.

list.title: SidechatAssetMetadata
list.description: An asset object, containing information about an image from the asset library

list.title: SidechatAuthToken
list.description: A user's bearer authentication token needed for most requests

list.title: SidechatCurrentUser
list.description: The current user's information

list.title: SidechatCursorString
list.description: A cursor for paginating through post lists

list.title: SidechatGroup
list.description: A group object, containing metadata about a group as well as its join conditions and states. Some properties vary based on the endpoint the object came from.

list.title: SidechatIdentity
list.description: A user's anonymous identity information

list.title: SidechatLibraryAsset
list.description: An asset object, containing information about an image from the asset library

list.title: SidechatMembership
list.description: Representation of a group membership

list.title: SidechatPostOrComment
list.description: A user-created post or comment, depending on the "type" prop

list.title: SidechatPostsAndCursor
list.description: A list of posts and the associated cursor

list.title: SidechatPrivateAssetURL
list.description: An asset URL that can only be accessed by making a request with a user's bearer token attached in the Authorization header

list.title: SidechatSimpleAsset
list.description: An asset object, containing information about an image within a post or comment

list.title: SidechatVoteString
list.description: A vote on a comment or post
